skill_constraints: Significant DevOps and QA single-person dependencies.
resource_bottlenecks: Senior DevOps Engineer (`backend-dev-3`) and QA Engineer are highly utilized and create bottlenecks.
mitigation_strategies: Prioritize knowledge sharing and documentation. Strict focus on sprint goals to avoid scope creep.

skill_constraints: Onboarding overhead for new DevOps contractor.
mitigation_strategies: Hire a DevOps contractor for 2 sprints to handle all infrastructure tasks in parallel, freeing up the senior developer to focus on complex backend features and mentoring.
